item.title: If cyber security is the answer, then what is the question?

item.title: Apples to Apples - Comparing Cyber Risks
item.author: DAH@CyberRiskQuant.com (Duncan Hart)
DAH@CyberRiskQuant.com (Duncan Hart)
item.description: Duncan Hart is the Founder and Managing Partner of Cyber Risk Quant, a niche specialist in cyber security strategy, performance and risk. With 25 years experience in technology, information and cyber security industry, including 10 years based in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America, Duncan has been responsible for handling some of the most challenging cyber security issues in both the private and public sectors. Prior to Cyber Risk Quant, Duncan spent several years with BHP, Bank of England, Vodafone Group and QinetiQ.
